description:
While looking for Water Warrior Flow, Data and Gantetsu find themselves on the beach facing Scissor Dragon Zarigarion!  Data and Gantetsu combine their powers to battle Zarigarion!  However no matter how many times they attack, Zarigarion’s limbs keep regenerating and his armor-like body isn’t even phased!  Is there any way to defeat Zarigarion?!
Source: crunchyroll
